name: py-agate-excel

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: agate-excel adds read support for Excel files (xls and xlsx) to agate.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-agate
dependencies.description:
agate is a Python data analysis library that is optimized for humans
instead of machines. It is an alternative to numpy and pandas that
solves real-world problems with readable code.

dependencies.name: py-xlrd
dependencies.description:
Library for developers to extract data from Microsoft Excel (tm)
spreadsheet files

dependencies.name: py-openpyxl
dependencies.description: A Python library to read/write Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm files

dependent_to.name: py-csvkit
dependent_to.description:
A library of utilities for working with CSV, the king of tabular file
formats
